name: Biggs, Rogue Legend
Lore: 'Piloted Red 3 at Battle of Yavin. Childhood friend of Luke. Led mutiny on Rand Ecliptic and theft of Ecliptic from shipyards at Bestine. Ecliptic Evaders emblem on helmet.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots, 3 on Red 3.  While piloting Red 3, it is maneuver +1 and he draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.  If at opponent''s system, instead of Force draining here, may take any card into hand from Force Pile; reshuffle.',
